description: Evaluation test cases for RAG compliance demo

cases.question: Can I build a 6-foot fence in my backyard?
cases.notes: Should cite both city and HOA height regulations

cases.question: What type of fence can I put in my front yard?
cases.notes: Should mention height limits and HOA style requirements

cases.question: Can I use chain link fencing?
cases.notes: HOA prohibits chain link; city allows it

cases.question: Do I need a permit to build a fence?
cases.notes: Should cover both city permit and HOA approval

cases.question: What is the maximum fence height allowed in my backyard?
cases.notes: Must use LA ordinance and demo_hoa_2, not San Diego

cases.question: What fence materials are prohibited?
cases.notes: Should cite LA and HOA2 material requirements

cases.question: What colors can I paint my fence?
cases.notes: San Diego city + HOA2 - should not cite HOA1 colors

cases.question: What are the requirements for a pool fence?
cases.notes: LA has specific pool fence section; tests city switching
